title: Unable to Connect to Server After Champ Select (approx. 1 out of 25 games)
body:
It seems that I randomly am unable to connect to the game after champion select once every few dozen games. This problem isn't fixed by clicking the 'Retry' Button (obviously) or by restarting the client and re-logging in or restarting the internet. I don't think it could be a problem with any sort of firewall that would affect 1 out of 25 games at random chance? And the problem doesn't seem to be time-specific as it can happen at any time of the day or night and the next game always goes through fine. Now I am put in lower-priority queue and have to wait 10 minutes to play. I would be completely fine with this happening if it just meant a little LP loss and my teammates could remake, but I guess I get reported for this connection issue and put in lower priority because of it. 

Does anyone have any fix for this issue/ Has anyone else experienced this sporadic connection issue?

Also, I am using the Mac client which may have something to do with it.

replies.body: just had 2 people in the same game have the issue. I was able to get back in, but the other person was not able to. I was also not queued with the other person.

Getting a low priority sucks with the uncertainty of what's going on, and not knowing when you're going to d/c.  Your network sounds like it's degrading, so there's actually a possibility that you'll see more disconnections eventually without resolution.  As a first step, I recommend going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  This will help tune up your network to the game server and help clear out any blocks.  Let me know if you have any questions!
